text:
Hi All,

Got a really weird one. We just built our a multi-language site. The primary domain is English, with others being /fr/, /en-gb/ (since we can’t use /eu/), and /jp/

Every time the client edits a page it’s automatically updating the set language from English to English - United States, which is actually changing the url by appending /en-us/, causing a ton of problems.

The domain language is set to English, not EN-US, so I know that’s not forcing it.

Why the heck is this setting getting changed?
